name: Ark Academy
description:
Welcome to Ark Academy, a short game about monsters getting through art school. You play as an intrepid art student trying to survive their art history lessons and bonding with their classmates.  Can you find love in this world?

This is a visual novel which contains 2 chapters.

Writing was made by Caitlin Duff, John Klamoth, and Eric Williamson

Characters by Caitlin Duff

Sound was made by John Klammath

Programming done by Barry Ng

We are using Ren’Py’s WebGl, which is in beta.

Voice Acting:

Chad - Talon Sims 

Prometheus - Tati Stapleton 

Kumo - Darline Stingley
